titleStmt.title: The profit of godliness set forth in five sermons on I Tim. 4, 8 : The unprofitableness of worldly gain : set forth in four sermons on Mark 8. 36, 37 : The parable of the barren fig-tree : opened and applied, in seven sermons, on Luk. 13. 6, 7, 8, 9 : Victorious violence, or, two sermons on Matth. 11, 12 / by that eminent and learned divine Mr. Thomas Byrdall ...
titleStmt.author: Byrdall, Thomas, 1607 or 8-1662?

titleStmt.title: The profit of godliness set forth in five sermons on I Tim. 4, 8 : The unprofitableness of worldly gain : set forth in four sermons on Mark 8. 36, 37 : The parable of the barren fig-tree : opened and applied, in seven sermons, on Luk. 13. 6, 7, 8, 9 : Victorious violence, or, two sermons on Matth. 11, 12 / by that eminent and learned divine Mr. Thomas Byrdall ...

notesStmt.note: "The profit of godliness", "The unprofitableness of worldly gain", "The parable of the barren figg-tree opened", and "Victorious violence" each have special t.p. and continuous paging.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
